text: Déborah François (born 24 May 1987Déborah François Biographie) is an actress from Belgium. She lives in Paris, France. She is best known for her role as in Belgian film L’Enfant (The Child), French film La Tourneuse de pages (The Page Turner), and she won a César Award for her role in a 2008 French film Le premier jour du reste de ta vie (The First Day of the Rest of Your Life). She was born in Liège, Belgium which is in the French-speaking area. She is the daughter of a policeman and a social worker. She was awarded the Romy- Schneider Prize and Prix Suzanne Bianchetti. ==Filmography== *2005 : L'Enfant *2006 : La Tourneuse de pages *2007 : Les Fourmis rouges *2007 : L'Été indien *2008 : Les Femmes de l'ombre *2008 : Le Premier Jour du reste de ta vie *2009 : Unmade Beds *2009 : Fais-moi plaisir *2009 : My Queen Karo *2010 : Memories Corner *2010 : Mes chères études *2011 : Le Moine - The Monk *2011 : Les Tribulations d'une caissière *2012 : Populaire ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian stage actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:Belgian voice actors Category:People from Liège
title: Déborah François
